SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.service.implementation

Class CartServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.peaslimited.shoppeas.service.implementation.CartServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CartService
@Service public class CartServiceImpl extends Object implements CartService
Implementation of the CartService interface that handles operations related to shopping cart functionality. This service provides methods to retrieve, add, update, and delete cart items.

    • getCartByUID

      public Map<String,Object> getCartByUID(String uid) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the shopping cart for a user by their user ID (UID).
      Specified by:
      getCartByUID in interface CartService
      Parameters:
      uid - The unique identifier of the user whose cart contents are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A map containing the cart details, including a list of transactions and their associated products.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs while retrieving data asynchronously.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted.

    • addCartItem

      public void addCartItem(String uid, Map<String,Object> data) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException, org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException
      Adds an item to the user's cart.
      Specified by:
      addCartItem in interface CartService
      Parameters:
      uid - The user ID of the user adding the item to their cart.
      data - A map containing the data of the product to be added (e.g., swp_id, quantity, total price).
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs while retrieving data asynchronously.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted.
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - If there are validation errors, such as invalid product or quantity.

    • updateCartQuantity

      public void updateCartQuantity(String uid, Map<String,Object> data) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Updates the quantity of a product in the user's cart.
      Specified by:
      updateCartQuantity in interface CartService
      Parameters:
      uid - The user ID of the user updating their cart.
      data - A map containing the data for the update (e.g., swp_id, quantity, price).
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs while retrieving data asynchronously.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted.
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - If the wholesaler or product does not exist, or if the cart is not found.

    • deleteCartProduct

      public void deleteCartProduct(String uid, Map<String,Object> data) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Deletes a product from the user's cart.
      Specified by:
      deleteCartProduct in interface CartService
      Parameters:
      uid - The user ID of the user deleting the product.
      data - A map containing the data of the product to be deleted (e.g., swp_id, uen).
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs while retrieving data asynchronously.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted.

    • checkQuantity

      public boolean checkQuantity(int quantity)
      Checks if the quantity in addToCart() is valid (i.e., quantity >=0)
      Specified by:
      checkQuantity in interface CartService
      Parameters:
      quantity - The quantity of a product being added to cart.
      Returns:
